name: GetTeamMembers
description:
Retrieve a list of team members for a specified team.

Use this tool to get a paginated list of members belonging to a specific team by providing the team ID.

parameters.name: member_limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of team members to return in a single request.

value_schema.description: Limit how many teams should be returned

parameters.name: added_since_timestamp
parameters.description: Include team members added since this timestamp in milliseconds.

value_schema.description: Timestamp in milliseconds to only include members added since then.

parameters.name: include_members_until
parameters.description: Timestamp in milliseconds to include members added until this time.

value_schema.description: Timestamp in milliseconds to only include members added until then.

parameters.name: search_team_members
parameters.description: Search for team members by their name, username, or email.

value_schema.description: Search team members by their name, username, and email.

parameters.name: filter_by_team_role
parameters.description: Return members with the specified team role. Valid roles include OWNER, MEMBER, DEVELOPER, SECURITY, BILLING, VIEWER, VIEWER_FOR_PLUS, and CONTRIBUTOR.

value_schema.description: Only return members with the specified team role.

parameters.name: exclude_project_id
parameters.description: Exclude members belonging to the specified project using the project ID.

value_schema.description: Exclude members who belong to the specified project.

parameters.name: project_id_for_eligible_members
parameters.description: Include team members eligible for the specified project by providing the project ID.

value_schema.description: Include team members who are eligible to be members of the specified project.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit how many teams should be returned

value_schema.description: Limit how many teams should be returned

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Timestamp in milliseconds to only include members added since then.

value_schema.description: Timestamp in milliseconds to only include members added since then.

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Timestamp in milliseconds to only include members added until then.

value_schema.description: Timestamp in milliseconds to only include members added until then.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search team members by their name, username, and email.

value_schema.description: Search team members by their name, username, and email.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Only return members with the specified team role.

value_schema.description: Only return members with the specified team role.

parameters.name: excludeProject
parameters.description: Exclude members who belong to the specified project.

value_schema.description: Exclude members who belong to the specified project.

parameters.name: eligibleMembersForProjectId
parameters.description: Include team members who are eligible to be members of the specified project.

value_schema.description: Include team members who are eligible to be members of the specified project.
